title: Custom games versus bots
body: Riot when will you implement custom games versus bots? I'm dying for some cs and skillshot practice on these new champs, but the only time I can play them is when I get my role.  It's been three weeks without it! I'm quite disappointed that it's been taking you this long to get it implemented in the client.

replies.body:
It's available if you launch into the *Legacy Client*, but it hasn't been brought over to the Beta Client just yet. You can access the Legacy Client at any time from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I can't provide a timeline on when you'll see this feature in the Beta Client, since I don't work on the Beta Client team. I recommend keeping an eye on the [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for any posts about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
